inlineContent.text: The composition tracks the Core Animation layer time and is rendered directly at the current dimensions of the
object saves the composition thatâ€™s loaded at the time the layer is archived. It detects layer usage and pauses or resumes the composition appropriately. A
object starts rendering the composition automatically when the layer is placed in a visible layer hierarchy. The layer stops rendering when it is hidden or removed from the visible layer hierarchy.

abstract.text: A layer that provides a layer suitable for rendering OpenGL content.

A layer that loads, plays, and controls Quartz Composer compositions in a Core Animation layer hierarchy.
Returns the composition associated with the layer.
Creates and returns an instance of a composition layer using the provided Quartz Composer composition.
Creates and returns an instance of a composition layer using the Quartz Composer composition in the specified file.
Initializes and returns a  composition layer using the provided Quartz Composer composition.

The
class represents a utility window that allows users to browse compositions that are in the Quartz Composer composition repository and, if supported, preview the composition. The
class cannot be subclassed.
The

class allows users to browse compositions that are in the Quartz Composer composition repository, and to preview them. You can set the default input parameters for a composition preview  by using the method setDefaultValue:forInputKey:.
The
protocol defines the methods used to pass data to the input ports or retrieve data from the output ports of the root patch of a Quartz Composer composition. This protocol is adopted by the

A base class to subclass for writing custom patches.
The

class communicates (through Cocoa bindings) between a custom patch and the view used for the internal settings of the custom patch. Only custom patches that use internal settings exposed to the user need to use the
class.
A base class for low-level rendering.
The
class is a custom
class that loads, plays, and controls Quartz Composer compositions. It is an autonomous view that is driven by an internal timer running on the main thread.
A layer that provides a layer suitable for rendering OpenGL content.
Methods that model a hierarchical timing system, allowing objects to map time between their parent and local time.
A protocol that enables an object to be encoded and decoded for archiving and distribution.
The group of methods that are fundamental to all Objective-C objects.
A protocol that enables encoding and decoding in a manner that is robust against object substitution attacks.
A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
A type that can be compared for value equality.
A type with a customized textual representation.
A type with a customized textual representation suitable for debugging purposes.
A type whose instances can be encoded, and appropriately passed, as elements of a C `va_list`.
A thread-safe type whose values can be shared across arbitrary concurrent contexts without introducing a risk of data races.
